webapp_blocks.block-content-1: Basic content section with text-focused layout and simple structure. Features headline, body text, and clean typography for informational content presentation.
webapp_blocks.block-content-2: Visual content section with overlapping image design and text integration. Features creative image layouts combined with descriptive content for enhanced visual storytelling.
webapp_blocks.block-content-3: Media-rich content section with video integration and supporting text. Features video player with descriptive content for multimedia presentations and product demonstrations.
webapp_blocks.block-cta-1: Centered call-to-action section with prominent headline, descriptive text, and primary action button. Clean and focused design for maximum conversion impact.
webapp_blocks.block-cta-2: Visual call-to-action layout combining compelling imagery with persuasive text and action buttons. Two-column design balances visual appeal with conversion elements.
webapp_blocks.block-cta-3: Minimal call-to-action section with focused messaging and single primary action. Streamlined design emphasizes urgency and clear value proposition for immediate conversions.
webapp_blocks.block-faq-1: Accordion-style FAQ section with expandable question-answer pairs. Features section header, organized Q&A layout with collapsible content for efficient information access.
webapp_blocks.block-faq-2: Enhanced FAQ layout with categorized questions and improved navigation. Features organized FAQ groups, search functionality, and user-friendly question organization.
webapp_blocks.block-faq-3: Comprehensive FAQ section with detailed content organization and visual enhancements. Features extensive Q&A coverage, visual elements, and structured information hierarchy.
webapp_blocks.block-feature-1: Grid-based feature showcase with icon-text combinations and structured layout. Features section header, multiple feature items with icons, headlines, and descriptions. Perfect for highlighting product capabilities and service benefits.
webapp_blocks.block-feature-2: Comprehensive feature section with visual elements and detailed descriptions. Combines imagery, icons, and text in a structured layout to showcase multiple product features or service advantages effectively.
webapp_blocks.block-feature-3: Organized feature display with clear categorization and visual hierarchy. Features section title, feature grid layout with icons, and detailed explanations. Ideal for complex products requiring clear feature communication.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-1: Single-column centered hero layout with announcement badge, large headline, description text, multiple CTA buttons, and customer logo showcase section. Perfect for product launches and service announcements.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-10: Single-column centered hero with comprehensive feature showcase. Includes large headline, description text, feature grid, and CTA elements. Great for product launches and feature-rich applications.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-11: Full-width hero layout with extensive content organization and multiple feature sections. Combines visual elements with detailed feature presentation and CTA integration.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-12: Streamlined hero layout with clean typography and focused content presentation. Features headline, description, and clear call-to-action in a minimalist design approach.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-13: Grid-based hero layout with structured content organization and visual hierarchy. Features multiple content blocks arranged in a clean grid system for enhanced readability and visual impact.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-14: Purpose-driven hero layout with emotional impact design. Features compelling headline, mission-focused content, and strong call-to-action elements. Ideal for non-profits, causes, and community organizations.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-15: Two-column book promotion layout with content showcase and visual presentation. Features title, description, author information, and purchase options. Perfect for books, publications, and creative works.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-16: Blog-style hero layout with content discovery focus. Features article headlines, excerpts, and navigation elements. Designed for blogs, news sites, and content-driven platforms.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-17: Mobile app-focused hero with app store integration and device mockups. Features app description, download buttons, and visual app presentation. Perfect for mobile app landing pages and launches.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-2: Two-column hero layout with sidebar-right configuration featuring headline, description, CTA buttons on the left and visual content on the right. Ideal for professional services and business presentations.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-3: Two-column balanced hero layout with content area containing headline, description, CTA buttons, and features list. Paired with visual showcase area. Great for detailed product presentations.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-4: Clean two-column hero layout with left content area featuring headline, description, and CTA button paired with right visual area. Simple and effective for agencies and portfolios.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-5: Creative hero layout with large visual showcase and multiple CTA options. Features prominent image display with dual action buttons. Perfect for events, conferences, and visual-first presentations.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-6: Two-column hero layout with primary content area containing headline, description text, structured information grid, and prominent download CTA. Features secondary visual area and company logo showcase section below. Ideal for product launches and software applications.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-7: Comprehensive hero layout with structured content sections, feature highlights, and multiple content blocks. Includes headline, description, and organized feature presentation. Ideal for software products and detailed service offerings.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-8: Immersive hero layout designed for experiential businesses. Features compelling visual storytelling with headline, description, and engaging CTA elements. Perfect for travel, hospitality, and experience-based services.
webapp_blocks.block-hero-9: Feature-focused hero layout with prominent headline, descriptive content, and structured feature presentation. Designed to highlight product capabilities and benefits effectively.
webapp_blocks.block-logos-1: Customer logo showcase with clean grid layout and brand display. Features company logos arranged in organized rows for social proof and credibility building.
webapp_blocks.block-logos-2: Enhanced logo section with contextual messaging and organized brand presentation. Features section header, customer logos grid, and supporting text for trust building and social proof.
webapp_blocks.block-logos-3: Compact logo display with streamlined brand showcase format. Features simplified logo grid layout ideal for highlighting key partnerships and customer relationships.
webapp_blocks.block-pricing-1: Classic pricing table layout with multiple plan tiers, feature comparisons, and CTA buttons. Includes section header, pricing cards with features lists, and clear tier differentiation for subscription-based services.
webapp_blocks.block-pricing-2: Advanced pricing display with detailed plan features and enhanced visual hierarchy. Features pricing cards, feature comparisons, billing toggle, and prominent upgrade options. Perfect for SaaS and subscription businesses.
webapp_blocks.block-pricing-3: Upgrade-focused pricing section designed to drive plan conversions. Features benefit highlights, comparison elements, and compelling upgrade messaging. Ideal for freemium models and plan upgrade campaigns.
webapp_blocks.block-socialproof-1: Social proof section with customer metrics and credibility indicators. Features statistics, testimonial highlights, and trust-building elements for conversion optimization.
webapp_blocks.block-socialproof-2: Enhanced social proof layout with multiple validation elements and visual testimonials. Features customer stories, review highlights, and comprehensive credibility showcase.
webapp_blocks.block-socialproof-3: Visual social proof section combining statistics with illustrative design elements. Features numerical metrics, visual representations, and compelling social validation for maximum impact.
webapp_blocks.block-team-1: Team showcase layout with member profiles, photos, and biographical information. Features section header, team member grid with photos, names, roles, and descriptions. Perfect for about pages and company presentations.
webapp_blocks.block-team-2: Enhanced team section with detailed member profiles and social links. Features comprehensive team member cards with photos, roles, bios, and contact information in organized grid layout.
webapp_blocks.block-team-3: Compact team display with avatar-focused design and essential member information. Features clean avatar grid with names and roles in minimalist presentation format.
webapp_blocks.block-testimonial-1: Simple testimonial layout with customer quote, attribution, and clean typography. Features single testimonial with author information and minimalist design approach.
webapp_blocks.block-testimonial-2: Multi-testimonial grid layout with customer photos, quotes, and detailed attribution. Features multiple testimonials in organized grid format with enhanced visual presentation and credibility elements.
webapp_blocks.block-testimonial-3: Featured testimonial section with prominent customer showcase and detailed social proof elements. Includes large testimonial display with customer details and trust-building visual components.

webapp_skeleton.block-footer-1: Basic footer layout with essential links and company information. Features simple column structure with navigation links, contact details, and copyright information.
webapp_skeleton.block-footer-2: Comprehensive footer with multiple content sections and social links. Features multi-column layout with detailed navigation, social media integration, and extended company information.
webapp_skeleton.block-footer-3: Advanced footer design with newsletter signup and rich content organization. Features subscription forms, detailed link categories, and enhanced brand presentation elements.
webapp_skeleton.block-header-1: Classic left-aligned logo navigation with 3 simple links (Home, Products, About), 1 Resources dropdown, and 1 primary CTA button (Get Started). NO hover animation on menu items. Navbar remains STICKY at top when scrolling. Ideal for: corporate sites, portfolios, landing pages needing persistent navigation.
webapp_skeleton.block-header-10: Dynamic left-aligned logo navigation with 3 links (Home, Products, About), 1 Resources dropdown, and 1 primary CTA button (Get Started). Menu items SCALE UP slightly on hover for playful interaction. Navbar scrolls NORMALLY with page content (not sticky). Ideal for: gaming sites, creative landing pages, playful brands without persistent navigation.
webapp_skeleton.block-header-11: Minimalist left-aligned logo navigation with 3 simple links (Home, Products, About), 1 Resources dropdown, and 1 primary CTA button (Get Started). Absolutely NO styling or hover effects on menu items for pure simplicity. Navbar remains STICKY at top when scrolling. Ideal for: minimal designs, brutalist aesthetics, content-first sites, distraction-free interfaces.
webapp_skeleton.block-header-12: Minimalist left-aligned logo navigation with 3 simple links (Home, Products, About), 1 Resources dropdown, and 1 primary CTA button (Get Started). webapp_components.card-example: A simple example demonstrating the Card component with header, content, and footer sections.
webapp_components.card-link-example: Demonstration of an interactive, clickable card component with link functionality.
webapp_components.card-showcase: Comprehensive showcase of Card component variants including default, outlined, elevated, and interactive styles with various configurations.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-core: Complete showcase of fundamental UI components including buttons, badges, headings, text, icons, and interactive elements. Demonstrates component variations, states, and styling options for comprehensive design system exploration.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-feedback: User feedback and notification component collection including alerts, progress indicators, loading states, toast notifications, and status communication elements. Essential for user experience and interaction feedback patterns.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-forms: Complete showcase of all form components including text inputs, selections, advanced fields, and complete form containers. Demonstrates single-page forms, multi-step wizards, and quiz forms with validation and interactive features.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-general: Ultimate component showcase featuring the complete library of available UI elements, layout patterns, and interactive components. Comprehensive reference for understanding the full capabilities and design system scope.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-header-navbar: A comprehensive example of a header and navbar with various layout variants, menu styles, and animations. Contains Navbar examples in the pages.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-layout: Comprehensive layout component library featuring grids, flexbox containers, sections, spacing utilities, and responsive layout patterns. Showcases structural components for building complex page architectures and content organization.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-media: Media component library featuring images, videos, galleries, lightboxes, document viewers, and multimedia presentation elements. Showcases visual content integration patterns and media-rich layout options.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-navbar: Complete navigation component showcase featuring different navbar styles, menu structures, responsive behaviors, and branding options. Demonstrates horizontal navigation patterns for website headers and top-level navigation.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-sidebar: Dashboard-style layout with comprehensive sidebar navigation and core dashboard components. Features vertical navigation patterns, user interfaces, and application-style layouts for admin panels and web applications.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-website-content: Extensive content component collection including markdown blocks, testimonials, team members, feature items, process steps, and rich content elements. Ideal for understanding content presentation patterns and editorial layouts.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-website-services: Service and form component library featuring contact forms, newsletter signups, waitlist components, and interactive service elements. Showcases user engagement patterns and data collection interfaces for websites.
webapp_components.kitchen-sink-website-utils: Utility component collection including SEO meta tags, language selectors, share buttons, date displays, lazy loading, and helper components. Features supportive elements that enhance functionality and user experience.

webapp_forms.form-booking: A complete hotel booking and reservation form with date selection, room preferences, guest information, and special requests. Perfect for hotels, vacation rentals, event venues, and appointment scheduling.
webapp_forms.form-contact: A professional contact form with customer satisfaction rating. Perfect for gathering customer inquiries, feedback, and testimonials with built-in validation and user-friendly design.
webapp_forms.form-inspection: A professional inspection and audit form for field technicians and service professionals. Features pass/fail evaluations, photo uploads, detailed notes, and digital signatures for compliance and documentation.
webapp_forms.form-quiz: A comprehensive educational quiz and exam platform with timed assessments, multiple question types, instant feedback, and scoring. Perfect for online courses, certification exams, and interactive learning experiences.
webapp_forms.form-simple: A minimal form example with one input field and two action buttons - perfect for learning the basics.
webapp_forms.form-survey: A comprehensive survey form for gathering customer feedback, market research, and user opinions. Features single-choice questions, multiple-choice selections, rating scales, and dropdown lists for detailed data collection.

webapp_blog.website-with-blog: A complete website example featuring a home page with hero section, features, and call-to-action, plus a dedicated blog listing page showcasing the BlogMainPage component with grid layout and pagination.
webapp_blog.post-ai-web-development: A comprehensive blog post exploring the transformative role of AI in modern web development. Covers AI-powered code completion, automated testing, design tools, and practical applications. Features real-world examples, code snippets, and insights into the future of AI-assisted development.
webapp_blog.post-getting-started-with-typescript: A complete blog post page about getting started with TypeScript, featuring a comprehensive guide with code examples, best practices, and related articles. Demonstrates a full-featured blog post layout with hero section, rich content, and engagement elements.

webapp_full.blog-example-1: A modern tech blog featuring articles about web development, AI, and software engineering best practices with a clean, professional design.
webapp_full.application-job: A comprehensive job application form with personal details, work experience, education, skills, and file upload for resume/cover letter. Perfect for companies and HR departments to collect structured candidate information and streamline the hiring process.
webapp_full.application-membership: A professional membership application form with applicant details, membership tier selection, professional background, references, and payment information. Ideal for professional associations, clubs, organizations, and exclusive communities to process new member applications.
webapp_full.booking-appointment-medical: A medical appointment scheduling form with patient information, appointment type selection, preferred dates/times, and insurance details. Ideal for healthcare providers, clinics, and medical practices to streamline patient appointment bookings.
webapp_full.booking-table-restaurant: A restaurant table booking form with guest details, reservation date/time, party size, and special requests including dietary restrictions and seating preferences. Perfect for restaurants, cafes, and dining establishments to manage online reservations.
webapp_full.contact-professional: A comprehensive professional contact form with multiple sections including office location, business hours, and team contact information. Ideal for businesses that want to provide detailed contact options and build trust with potential clients.
webapp_full.demo-request-product: A product demo scheduling form with company details, team size, preferred time slots, and specific interests. Ideal for SaaS companies and B2B service providers to qualify and schedule product demonstrations with potential clients.
webapp_full.feedback-product: A comprehensive product feedback form with feature ratings, bug reporting, and improvement suggestions. Perfect for SaaS companies and product teams to collect structured user feedback and identify product enhancement opportunities.
webapp_full.form-booking: A complete hotel booking and reservation form with date selection, room preferences, guest information, and special requests. Perfect for hotels, vacation rentals, event venues, and appointment scheduling.
webapp_full.form-contact: A professional contact form with customer satisfaction rating. Perfect for gathering customer inquiries, feedback, and testimonials with built-in validation and user-friendly design.
webapp_full.form-inspection: A professional inspection and audit form for field technicians and service professionals. Features pass/fail evaluations, photo uploads, detailed notes, and digital signatures for compliance and documentation.
webapp_full.form-quiz: A comprehensive educational quiz and exam platform with timed assessments, multiple question types, instant feedback, and scoring. Perfect for online courses, certification exams, and interactive learning experiences.
webapp_full.form-simple: A minimal form example with one input field and two action buttons - perfect for learning the basics.
webapp_full.form-survey: A comprehensive survey form for gathering customer feedback, market research, and user opinions. Features single-choice questions, multiple-choice selections, rating scales, and dropdown lists for detailed data collection.
webapp_full.newsletter-signup: A clean and simple newsletter subscription form with interest preferences, frequency selection, and GDPR-compliant consent. Perfect for blogs, content creators, and businesses building their email list.
webapp_full.quiz-assessment: An interactive skills assessment quiz with multiple-choice questions, self-evaluation ratings, and personalized recommendations. Perfect for educational platforms, HR departments, training programs, and career development to evaluate knowledge levels and provide tailored learning paths.
webapp_full.quote-request-service: A detailed service quote request form with project scope, budget range, timeline, and service type selection. Perfect for service providers, consultants, and agencies to gather comprehensive project information from potential clients.
webapp_full.registration-course: A comprehensive course registration form with student information, course selection, experience level, learning objectives, and payment details. Perfect for educational institutions, training providers, and online learning platforms to streamline student enrollment.
webapp_full.registration-event: A comprehensive event registration form with attendee information, ticket selection, session preferences, dietary requirements, and networking options. Perfect for conferences, workshops, seminars, and corporate events to manage attendee registrations efficiently.
webapp_full.registration-webinar: A streamlined webinar signup form with attendee details, session selection, timezone preferences, and reminder options. Perfect for online events, training sessions, product launches, and educational webinars to capture registrations and send automated confirmations.
webapp_full.survey-customer-satisfaction: A comprehensive customer satisfaction survey with rating scales, multiple choice questions, and open-ended feedback. Perfect for gathering customer insights, measuring service quality, and identifying areas for improvement.
webapp_full.survey-market-research: A comprehensive market research survey with demographic questions, product preferences, purchasing behavior analysis, and competitive insights. Perfect for businesses conducting market analysis, product development research, and customer segmentation studies.
webapp_full.beauty-nyc-center: An inviting and informative online presence for a beauty center in New York, allowing clients to discover services, view portfolios, book appointments, and contact the center.
webapp_full.beauty-nyc-minimal: Create a professional and elegant website for a beauty center in New York.
webapp_full.beauty-serenity-nyc: A professional and inviting full website for a beauty center in New York, showcasing services, allowing online booking, and providing contact information.
webapp_full.blog-tech: A modern technology blog website with articles on web development, AI, cloud computing, and software engineering. Features a clean reading experience, author profiles, category filtering, and responsive design. Perfect for tech bloggers, developer advocates, and technical content creators.
webapp_full.landing-saas: Professional SaaS landing page for CloudSync, a file synchronization platform. Features hero with announcement badge, social proof logos, stats showcase, detailed feature grid, customer testimonials with avatars, pricing table with multiple tiers, FAQ section, and conversion-optimized CTAs. Demonstrates modern landing page best practices with specialized components.
webapp_full.portfolio-developer: A modern developer portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, experience, and contact information. Features a clean minimalist design, project gallery with case studies, tech stack highlights, and professional about section. Perfect for software engineers, web developers, and technical professionals seeking to showcase their work.
webapp_full.restaurant-fine-dining: An elegant fine dining restaurant website featuring menu showcase, online reservations, chef profiles, and ambiance gallery. Demonstrates sophisticated design with rich imagery, seasonal menus, testimonials, and integrated booking system. Perfect for upscale restaurants, bistros, and culinary establishments.
webapp_full.steel-usa-manufacturer: A professional, multi-page website for a steel manufacturer based in the USA to showcase their products, services, and company information, emphasizing product quality and manufacturing capabilities.
webapp_full.steel-yellowstone: A professional, multi-page website for Yellow Stone Steel, a steel manufacturer based in the USA, to showcase their products, services, and company information.
webapp_full.website-blog-example: A complete website example featuring a home page with hero section, features, and call-to-action, plus a dedicated blog listing page showcasing the BlogMainPage component with grid layout and pagination.
